ci_support_linux_64_.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9

about.description: A pure Python class library to facilitate programatic generation of web pages. Three main classes Page - represents the full HTML. PageItem - an abstract base class for most non-form tags. PageFormItem - an abstract base class for tags that return information.
about.summary: A python package to support HTML generation

about.description: A pure Python class library to facilitate programatic generation of web pages. Three main classes Page - represents the full HTML. PageItem - an abstract base class for most non-form tags. PageFormItem - an abstract base class for tags that return information.
about.summary: A python package to support HTML generation

name: ja-webutils
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "ja-webutils" %}
{% set version = "0.1.12" %}
{% set python_min = "3.10" %}


package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.org/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/ja_webutils-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: fda278abed65d1cb24517997ca7aa1be00acbc32b017893df4d2054f591cae26

build:
  noarch: python
  script: {{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv --no-deps --no-build-isolation
  number: 0

requirements:
  host:
    - python >={{ python_min }}
    - setuptools >=61
    - setuptools-scm >=3.4.3
    - wheel
    - pip
  run:
    - python >={{ python_min }}

test:
  imports:
    - ja_webutils
  commands:
    - pip check
  requires:
    - pip

about:
  home: https://git.ligo.org/joseph-areeda/ja_webutils
  dev_url: https://git.ligo.org/joseph-areeda/ja_webutils.git
  doc_url: https://joseph-areeda.docs.ligo.org/ja_webutils/
  summary: A python package to support HTML generation
  license: GPL-3.0-or-later
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE.txt
  description: A pure Python class library to facilitate programatic generation of web pages. Three main classes
    Page - represents the full HTML. PageItem - an abstract base class for most non-form tags. 
    PageFormItem - an abstract base class for tags that return information.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - areeda
